create RNAmod
```{r tRNA}
mod <- RNAmod("test",
              "experiment_layout.csv",
              "sacCer3_R64-2-1_masked.gff3",
              "sacCer3_R64-2-1_masked.fasta")

modifications <- c("m7G","D","m3C")
parseForModifications(mod,1,modifications)

se <- getSummarizedExperiment(mod,1,modifications)

tRNA <- rownames(se)[grepl("t", rownames(se), fixed = TRUE)]
rRNA <- c("RDN18-1","RDN25-1")

saveModPlot(mod,se,modifications,c(tRNA,rRNA))
saveModPlot(mod,se,modifications,c(tRNA,rRNA),focus = TRUE)
```
